input.sentences: she was shocked when she saw what her husband had did .
he had mad her a complete home office . a dream that she had always wished for .
output.sentences: I was shocked to see that my husband had already set up the office and it looked very neat and nice.
He also bought a new, top of the line, computer, which wil be easier for both of us to use.
We turned this wall into a place to hang our various bags.
For now, we're using some plastic cases and some old shelves to house all of our books.
I am a little mad he did the office alone and I wished he'd let me help him.
